Key Match Events: Trevor Story broke an 0-for-13 skid with two hits
Ceddanne Rafaela clubbed a two-run homer to break a tie and push the Red Sox ahead
Enmanuel Valdez’s 12-pitch at-bat in the seventh helped set up Ceddanne Rafaela’s home run
Pre-Game Insights: The Red Sox are hoping they can mimic the way Trevor Story has exceeded injury recovery expectations
Trevor Story’s return is seen as a morale boost for the team, one that can rejuvenate the club over the next 21 games
The Red Sox will move Rafaela to second base, a position at which he’s appeared just 10 times in the majors
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora expressed pride in the team's ability to beat the odds with Trevor Story's return
Trevor Story’s defense will undoubtedly solidify the team
Rafaela beamed when asked about the opportunity to play alongside Story
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trevor Story’s remarkable turnaround from a season-ending shoulder injury
Luis Guerrero, a 2021 17th-round pick, has overcome physical limitations to emerge as one of the best relief arms in the Red Sox system
